display_long_description:
Ghost Photographers is a multiplayer horror game where you must escape as you evade terrifying spirits. Use voice chat and cooperate with your friends to make it out of this despair-filled, nine-story building! [media]

Peer through the screen of your smartphone camera and you’ll see things invisible to the naked eye. Team up with up to three of your friends, grab the candles, solve puzzles, and use the elevators from floor to floor as you aim to escape. [media]

When the wandering ghosts draw near...
Will you call for help from your friends? Run for your life? Or hold your breath and hide? No matter what you do, pray that she doesn't see you![media]
